entry.dcterms:title: TÁRKI Omnibus 2003/4. Social-political attitudes in Hungary among the adult population.
entry.dcterms:creator: Zsadányi-Nagy, Csaba
entry.dcterms:subject: TÁRKI Joint Research Center TDATA-F65: TÁRKI Omnibus 2003/4. Social-political attitudes in Hungary among the adult population.. data sheet. Version: 2007-01-19
entry.dcterms:creator: 1. Gazsó, Tibor
2. Tóth, István György
3. Lengyel, György
4. Surányi, Péter
entry.dcterms:contributor: Budapest University of Economic Sciences and Public Administration (3.)
entry.dcterms:description: 1) party preferences, popularity of politicians, evaluation of the work of the government and opposition, subjective financial situation, evaluating the economic situation of Hungary 2) preferences regarding the EU accession 3) the economic effect of the EU accession on Hungary, the effect of the information society on Hungary, the opinion of the Hungarian elites about the EU accession, about the current economic and political situation in Hungary 4) car demand and supply, attitude surveys regarding driving a car
entry.dcterms:subject: political institutions, public administration
consumption/consumer behavior
income, property and savings
mass media
international politics and organisations
social stratification and groupings
religion and values
economic conditions and indicators
person
survey data
cross-section

A multi-stage proportionally stratified random probability sample representative of the Hungarian adult population. Unsuccessful inquiries were substituted with supplementary addresses, where persons to be interviewed were selected on the basis of the Leslie Kish key.
face-to-face interview
block 1: A, block 2: A, block 3: A, block 4: D
entry.dcterms:rights: Publications based on TÁRKI data collections should acknowledge those sources, primary investigators and depositors.
